article_text:
Politics aside, PPACA has changed the health insurance landscape. But the post-PPACA dental landscape is dynamic, too.

Politics aside, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act has changed the employee benefits landscape.

While health insurance has dominated the conversation, there seems to be some confusion and uncertainty regarding dental. I’d like to clear a few things up today.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Bruce Hentschel
article_metadata.description: Politics aside, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act has changed the health insurance landscape. But the post-PPACA dental landscape is dynamic, too.
